0.text: Innate: Fizz is permanently  ghosted.

1.text: Fizz takes 4 (+ 1% AP)  reduced damage from every instance of damage, up to a maximum of 50% reduction.

0.text: Active: Fizz  dashes a fixed distance in the direction of the target enemy, and upon colliding with them or if they are still within 200 units when the dash ends, he deals them magic damage plus 100% AD physical damage and applies  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.

1.text: Seastone Trident and  Chum the Waters can be cast during the dash.

0.text: Passive: Fizz's basic attacks rend enemies  on-hit, dealing magic damage every 0.5 seconds over 3 seconds, refreshing  on-hit.

1.text: Active: Fizz's next basic attack within 4 seconds has an  uncancellable windup, deals bonus magic damage and gains  50 bonus range.

2.text: If Seastone Trident kills its target, its  cooldown is reduced to 1 second and refunds  mana. Otherwise, if Seastone Trident doesn't kill its target, Fizz's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage  on-hit for the next 5 seconds.

3.text: Seastone Trident  resets Fizz's basic attack timer.

0.text: Active: Fizz  dashes to the target location while becoming  untargetable, balancing on his trident for 0.75 seconds, during which he can cast  Trickster after 0.15 seconds into the duration.

1.text: Fizz then begins to hop off of his trident over 0.5 seconds, afterwards becoming targetable and landing to create a splash beneath him that deals magic damage to all nearby enemies and  slows them for 2 seconds.

2.text: While hopping off of the trident, Fizz may input movement commands to direct his landing. Playful will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Fizz  dashes to the target location, hopping down and splashing onto the ground prematurely upon arrival to deal the same damage in a smaller radius but not applying the slow.

1.text: Trickster will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Fizz throws down a lure at the target location that attracts a shark, granting  sight of the area before emerging and chomping at the lure after 2 seconds, dealing magic damage to surrounding enemies,  knocking them back, though not through terrain, and  slowing them for 2 seconds. The further the lure travels in its initial flight, the larger the shark that is attracted; increasing Chum the Waters'  damage, slow, eruption radius and knock back distance.

1.text: Guppy (<455): 40% slow, 200 eruption radius and 150 unit knock back distance.

2.text: Chomper (455-910): 60% slow, 325 eruption radius and 250 unit knock back distance.

3.text: Gigalodon (>910): 80% slow, 450 eruption radius and 350 unit knock back distance.

4.text: Enemy  champions can intercept the lure while it is in flight, which attaches to them upon contact and causes the shark to emerge at their position after the same delay. The lure's holder is  slowed and  revealed for the duration and afterwards is impacted by the eruption but is  knocked up for 1 second instead of knocked back.

5.text: Chum the Waters will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

Keywords

  • yellow

  • trinket

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).
Corrupting Potion can be used even at full health and mana.
passive.originText: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.208 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 125 health and 75 mana. During this time, basic attacks and damaging abilities against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved for area of effect and damage over time effects.
consume.originText: Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.208 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 125 health and 75 mana. During this time, basic attacks and damaging abilities against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved for area of effect and damage over time effects.

1.originHTML: +  350

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+80 ability power
+20 ability haste
+600 mana
+6 magic penetration

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Echo: Dealing ability damage to an enemy deals 100 (+ 10% AP) additional magic damage to them and launches orbs at up to 3 other enemies within 600 units around them, impacting after 0.528 seconds to deal the same damage to each, and grants you 15% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Dealing ability damage against champions reduces the cooldown of Echo by 0.5 seconds per champion, up to a maximum of 3 seconds per cast (10 second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 magic penetration.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ECHO: Dealing ability damage to an enemy deals 100 (+ 10% AP) additional magic damage to them and launches orbs at up to 3 other enemies within  600 units around them, impacting after 0.528 seconds to deal the same damage to each, and grants you 15% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Dealing ability damage against champions reduces the cooldown of Echo by 0.5 seconds per champion, up to a maximum of 3 seconds per cast (10 second cooldown).

If Seastone Trident kills its target, its  cooldown is reduced to 1 second and refunds  mana. Otherwise, if Seastone Trident doesn't kill its target, Fizz's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage  on-hit for the next 5 seconds.
